release.description: New major release. Improve and polish Crawljax, add some new features
release.action: Ali, Danny, Frank, Stefan: Various improvements and polishments.
Hibernate has been removed.
Properties file is no longer supported.
Support for iframe crawling.
Fix a bug where hashes, dots and spaces were not allowed in attribute values of clickables.
Extended Crawljax Exceptions with more information about the system used. This is helpful to debug problems.
Fix bug where wrong currentState was stored in in CrawlSession when OnInvariantViolation was called.
Make Crawljax work with Firefox 2.0. You also need a patched webdriver.
Upgrade WebDriver dependency to Selenium 2.0a2.
Added support for Google Chrome 4.0. Newer version do not work because of WebDriver issues.
Handle popups such as alert by always "clicking" OK. This is a workaround and doesn't always work.
Rename oracle comparators. The names are more logical now.
Fix bug where a Crawljax would write to / if the output directory was not set.
This is a major release. See http://crawljax.com
New configuration API which is now the preferred way of configuration.
The use of a database optional (by default turned off).
New Plugin Types.
Oracle Comparators for comparing states.
Easy to write Invariants.
Totally new form handling.
CrawlConditions and other options for better guiding the crawling.
WaitConditions to improve crawling slow application.
ElementResolver for more robust finding and clicking elements.
Moved proxy to a seperate plugin in order to make core less complex.
Dropped JPF and Watij.
Added examples.
Conditions for dynamic state checking.
mesbah, danny, frank, stefan: Bug fixes.
mesbah, danny: Performance improvements.
mesbah, danny, frank, stefan: Lots of other improvements.
mesbah, danny, frank, stefan: Improved Javadoc comments.
mesbah, danny, frank, stefan: Fixed checkstyle warnings.
XPath bug in Watij on XMLNS attribute of the HTML tag is resolved.
Use the Levenshtein method of Apache Commons Lang lib, which is faster.
Mirror generator as a postCrawling plugin.
WebDriver's browsers (IE, Firefox) can be used as embedded browser.
Configuration file is extended with new properteis.
Many Bug fixes.
A proxy is integrated into Crawljax.
A number of plugins (called DIVA) for spotting security violations in web widget interactions.
Use of wildcards for tag inclusion and exclusion in the crawljax.properties.
Missing hibernate properties files included in the jar.
Many bug-fixes and improvements.
A plugin architectur is added which consists of three hooks: preCrawling, inCrawling, and postCrawling.
All classes are Jalopied and Checkstyled.
Check the existence of all the required properties.
A number of new functionalities added.
Updated the README.
